document_api_meta.title: Creator Search Sample Application Fulfillments
document_api_meta.env_desc: You, the creator, can use this API to query the fulfillment status for the received sample applications.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: sort_order
request_query_param.desc:
The sort order for the field specified in the sort_field parameter. 
Default: ASC
Possible values:
ASC: Ascending order
DESC: Descending order

request_query_param.name: sort_field
request_query_param.desc:
Some sorting fields are as follows:
- expired_time: sort by left time to fulfill.
- create_time: sort by fulfillment content create time.
Default value  is expired_time.

request_body_param.name: fulfillment_statuses
request_body_param.desc:
A list of fulfillment statuses. The response is filtered to include sample fulfillments with the fulfillment_status field set to one of the specified values.  The possible values are:
- PENDING: The creator has not yet fulfilled the content creation obligation.
- ONGOING: Fulfillment is in progress; content has been created and is being evaluated against criteria.
- SUCCEED: Fulfillment has been successfully completed; the content meets the required standards.
- FAILED: Fulfillment failed; the content did not meet the required standards.
- OVERDUE: Fulfillment is overdue; the creator did not meet the deadline.
- SUSPEND: Fulfillment has been suspended.
- CANCELLED: Fulfillment has been cancelled, either by the creator or due to operational reasons.
- EXEMPTED: The creator is exempt from the fulfillment obligation.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^^sample_application_type
response_param.desc:
The type of the sample application. This is an enumerated type with values:
- FREE_SAMPLE
- SAMPLE_COUPON
- SAMPLE_CAMPAIGN
- PLATFORM_FREE_SAMPLE

response_param.name: ^^expiration_time
response_param.desc:
Fulfillment deadline timestamp.
Usually the value is  `{you_receiving_sample_time} + 14Days`. But if you apply for fulfillment suspension, the value is `{you_receiving_sample_time} + 14Days + total_suspend_duration`.

response_param.name: ^^total_suspend_duration
response_param.desc: The duration you applied for fulfillment suspension in seconds.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The fulfillment status.This is an enumerated type with values:
- PENDING: The creator has not yet fulfilled the content creation obligation.
- ONGOING: Fulfillment is in progress; content has been created and is being evaluated against criteria.
- SUCCEED: Fulfillment has been successfully completed; the content meets the required standards.
- FAILED: Fulfillment failed; the content did not meet the required standards.
- OVERDUE: Fulfillment is overdue; the creator did not meet the deadline.SUSPEND: Fulfillment has been suspended.
- CANCELLED: Fulfillment has been cancelled, either by the creator or due to operational reasons.
- EXEMPTED: The creator is exempt from the fulfillment obligation.

response_param.name: ^^bound_product_status
response_param.desc:
The marketing status of the product associated with the fulfillment order. This is an enumerated type with values:
- UNKNOWN: The marketing status of the product is unknown.
- LIVE: The product is available for fulfillment.
- OUT_OF_STOCK: The product is out of stock and cannot be fulfilled.
- SELLER_DEACTIVATE: The product has been deactivated by the seller.
- PLATFORM_DEACTIVATE: The product has been deactivated by the platform.
- NO_PLAN: There is no valid plan available for the creator to market the product.
- PERMANENT_DELETED: The product has been permanently deleted and is no longer available.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to get details regarding your collaborations, including searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration detaiIs and updates, and querying sample applications and related fulfillment details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to get your collaborations, including getting the collaboration, searching collaborations, tracking collaboration performance, receiving collaboration updates, and getting sample distribution.
